5461.verse: وَأَنَّا|And that we,|107|116|17404$مِنَّا|among us|83|100|1169$ٱلْمُسْلِمُونَ|(are) Muslims|115|132|17432$وَمِنَّا|and among us|112|129|17424$ٱلْقَـٰسِطُونَ‌ۖ|(are) unjust.|116|133|17433$فَمَنْ|And whoever|106|115|402$أَسْلَمَ|submits,|75|121|1042$فَأُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ|then those|92|184|777$تَحَرَّوْاْ|have sought|102|194|17434$رَشَدًا|(the) right path.|129|175|10625$

5462.verse: وَأَمَّا|And as for|88|113|269$ٱلْقَـٰسِطُونَ|the unjust,|116|165|17433$فَكَانُواْ|they will be,|101|150|9833$لِجَهَنَّمَ|for Hell,|76|125|7016$حَطَبًا|firewood.``|97|122|17435$

5463.verse: وَأَلَّوِ|And if|62|68|17436$ٱسْتَقَـٰمُواْ|they had remained|143|156|7427$عَلَى|on|63|76|52$ٱلطَّرِيقَةِ|the Way,|97|110|17437$لَأَسْقَيْنَـٰهُم|surely We (would) have given them to drink|310|316|17438$مَّآءً|water|58|304|202$غَدَقًا|(in) abundance,|125|371|17439$

5464.verse: لِّنَفْتِنَهُمْ|That We might test them|188|195|11695$فِيهِ‌ۚ|therein.|71|86|32$وَمَن|And whoever|106|121|1012$يُعْرِضْ|turns away|94|109|17440$عَن|from|54|69|1105$ذِكْرِ|the Remembrance|138|145|5228$رَبِّهِۦ|(of) his Lord,|106|142|392$يَسْلُكْهُ|He will make him enter|168|240|17441$عَذَابًا|a punishment|108|180|2933$صَعَدًا|severe.|78|114|17442$

5466.verse: وَأَنَّهُۥ|And that|78|86|7215$لَمَّا|when|55|72|3471$قَامَ|stood up|78|94|17444$عَبْدُ|(the) slave|93|110|11172$ٱللَّهِ|(of) Allah|81|98|606$يَدْعُوهُ|calling (upon) Him,|143|160|17445$كَادُواْ|they almost|98|106|694$يَكُونُونَ|became|94|179|17446$عَلَيْهِ|around him|92|262|395$لِبَدًا|a compacted mass.|149|234|17447$

5470.verse: إِلَّا|But|42|52|86$بَلَـٰغًا|(the) notification|133|152|17450$مِّنَ|from|50|69|156$ٱللَّهِ|Allah|53|72|606$وَرِسَـٰلَـٰتِهِۦ‌ۚ|and His Messages.`|150|169|17451$وَمَن|And whoever|106|125|1012$يَعْصِ|disobeys|77|86|3794$ٱللَّهَ|Allah|53|71|1809$وَرَسُولَهُۥ|and His Messenger,|148|184|3790$فَإِنَّ|then indeed,|103|139|599$لَهُۥ|for him|65|101|977$نَارَ|(is the) Fire|98|134|7695$جَهَنَّمَ|(of) Hell,|78|96|2655$خَـٰلِدِينَ|(they will) abide|127|230|1409$فِيهَآ|therein|66|271|253$أَبَدًا|forever.|72|174|4093$

5473.verse: عَـٰلِمُ|(The) All-Knower|132|155|5735$ٱلْغَيْبِ|(of) the unseen,|129|175|2854$فَلَا|so not|62|108|208$يُظْهِرُ عَلَىٰ|He reveals|128|174|17455$غَيْبِهِۦٓ|His unseen|91|114|17456$أَحَدًا|(to) anyone,|104|104|4849$

5475.verse: لِّيَعْلَمَ|That He may make evident|198|214|9078$أَن|that|48|81|655$قَدْ|indeed,|68|101|1097$أَبْلَغُواْ|they have conveyed|156|189|17458$رِسَـٰلَـٰتِ|(the) Messages|123|140|6493$رَبِّهِمْ|(of) their Lord;|119|130|54$وَأَحَاطَ|and He has encompassed|188|210|17459$بِمَا|what|53|74|43$لَدَيْهِمْ|(is) with them|113|134|2856$وَأَحْصَىٰ|and He takes account|166|177|17460$كُلَّ|(of) all|64|172|2487$شَىْءٍ|things|69|286|186$عَدَدَۢا|(in) number.`|109|217|17461$

5461.verse: And among us are Muslims [in submission to Allah], and among us are the unjust. And whoever has become Muslim - those have sought out the right course.

5462.verse: But as for the unjust, they will be, for Hell, firewood.'

5463.verse: And [Allah revealed] that if they had remained straight on the way, We would have given them abundant provision

5464.verse: So We might test them therein. And whoever turns away from the remembrance of his Lord He will put into arduous punishment.

5465.verse: And [He revealed] that the masjids are for Allah, so do not invoke with Allah anyone.

5466.verse: And that when the Servant of Allah stood up supplicating Him, they almost became about him a compacted mass."

5467.verse: Say, [O Muhammad], "I only invoke my Lord and do not associate with Him anyone."

5468.verse: Say, "Indeed, I do not possess for you [the power of] harm or right direction."

5469.verse: Say, "Indeed, there will never protect me from Allah anyone [if I should disobey], nor will I find in other than Him a refuge.

5470.verse: But [I have for you] only notification from Allah, and His messages." And whoever disobeys Allah and His Messenger - then indeed, for him is the fire of Hell; they will abide therein forever.

5471.verse: [The disbelievers continue] until, when they see that which they are promised, then they will know who is weaker in helpers and less in number.

5472.verse: Say, "I do not know if what you are promised is near or if my Lord will grant for it a [long] period."

5473.verse: [He is] Knower of the unseen, and He does not disclose His [knowledge of the] unseen to anyone

5474.verse: Except whom He has approved of messengers, and indeed, He sends before each messenger and behind him observers

5475.verse: That he may know that they have conveyed the messages of their Lord; and He has encompassed whatever is with them and has enumerated all things in number.
